text: Anante Pekahia sondia vahete ugota hu'nea kva ne' Remalia nemofo Peka'a otino Giliati kazigati 50'a vahe zamavarege'za Pekahiama ahefrisaza kea retro hu'naze. Hagi Pekahia'a kini nompi mago hunaragintageno hanavetinefi mani'nege'za anafe hu'za anampinka mareri'za nehe'za, Agrobune Arienena magoka zamahe'naze. Anama hutazageno Pekahia no erino, Peka'a Israeli vahe kinia mani'ne.
